name: ibm-streams
description: IBM Streams Support for Visual Studio Code

ibm-streams.environment.refreshInterval.description: Interval in minutes at which an IBM Streams instance is automatically refreshed.

ibm-streams.environment.timeoutForReques.description: Timeout in seconds before a request times out.

ibm-streams.environment.toolkitPaths.description: Paths to directories, comma or semicolon separated, containing additional IBM Streams toolkits.

ibm-streams.server.mode.markdownDescription: Controls how the SPL language server runs. Running the server in `embedded` mode is recommended unless you are experiencing issues with SPL language features.

ibm-streams.server.port.markdownDescription: The port where the SPL language server runs when `#ibm-streams.server.mode#` is `socket`.

ibm-streams.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the SPL language server.

ibm-streams.environment.OSStreamsImageLo.description: Path to registry DNS and port(ex: localhost:5000), namespace(ex: $USER) and the image(ex: streams-runtime:6.debug)

commands.title: Open IBM Cloud Pak for Data Dashboard
Add Toolkit to Streams Build Service
Remove Toolkits from Streams Build Service
Open Cloud Pak for Data Instance Details
Open Cloud Pak for Data Deployment Space Details
Open Cloud Pak for Data Deployment Project Details
Open Cloud Pak for Data Job Details
Open Cloud Pak for Data Project
Open Cloud Pak for Data Job Definition Details
Open Cloud Pak for Data Job Run Details
Open Cloud Pak for Data Job Run Details

scripts.package: npm-run-all clean installdeps:complete && vsce package --yarn --githubBranch main
scripts.test:compile: yarn run compile && tsc -p ./ && ts-node test/copyStaticAssets.ts
